title: Real Housewife Jen Shah, the (Scamming) Wizard of Utah
description:
Real Housewife of Salt Lake City’s very own Jen Shah portrayed herself as one of the richest and most lavish housewives, complete with a multi million dollar ski chalet where she threw “Gatsby-like” parties. But her fairytale quickly crumbles when she’s arrested outside of her home on fraud-related charges. Now, she’s on trial for scamming hundreds of elderly folks and facing up to 50 years in jail. Tune in to hear it all!

LinkTree: https://linktr.ee/legallyjudgy
